content.heading: Guests
paras: Respectfully, this will be an adult only event and only children of immediate family will be in attendance.

content.heading: Menu
paras: Dinner will be catered by Midwood Smokehouse (local Carolina BBQ joint); if you have any dietary restrictions, please indicate them on the RSVP page

content.heading: Accomodations
paras: We have blocked a book of discounted rooms in Uptown Charlotte at the Holiday Inn Charlotte Center City under 'Bacino/Gonzales'. The hotel is just around the corner from the ceremony/reception (Levine Museum). Please use the link below or call the hotel at 704.335.5400 (mention our names) to reserve your room. Reserve Room Bacino/Gonzales
Also, note that you must book by 9/26/2018 to get the group rate.

content.heading: Travel
paras: If you are flying in to Charlotte International Airport, you can get an Uber/Lyft to the hotel for about $15. There is also a shuttle (Sprinter Shuttle) that will take you near the hotel for a few dollars.

thingsToDo.heading: Things to Do
headingParas: If you're in town for the whole weekend, here are some of our suggestions on how to get to know Charlotte better. We have broken our favorite things to do by types below.
Beer - Charlotte is home to over 30 local breweries. If you're looking for a fun afternoon, you can walk the Rail Trail in South End or stroll around NoDa to hit up some of the more popular spots.

Food - While Charlotte might not be on the culinary level of bigger cities like New York or Chicago, the food scene is rapidly growing. And for all of you Yankees, Charlotte knows how to do Southern food right.
Activities - You don't need to eat or drink to have fun!

cards.para: Charlotte's own bustling food destination in the heart of the city! Great coffee, food, and even a few bars inside with tvs. Think of a smaller version of Philadelphia's reading terminal market

Probably the busiest brewery in Charlotte - and situated in the ever so bustling heart of South End. Since it's located right on the rail trail, you can explore South End after a few drinks!

sideNotes.heading: Walkable from hotel:
sideNotes.text: Yes, but the light rail is probably better to take (30 minute walk)

cards.para: If you have the time on Saturday, this is a cool place. Guests can enjoy whitewater rafting and kayaking, flatwater kayaking, stand-up paddle boarding, rock climbing, zip lines, ropes courses, a canopy tour, and mountain biking on our 30+ mile trail system.

sideNotes.heading: Walkable from hotel:
sideNotes.text: no - but you can Uber if you don't have a car

cards.para: We actually have not been here, but have heard it's a fun time. The NASCAR Hall of Fame is an interactive entertainment attraction honoring the history and heritage of NASCAes courses, a canopy tour, and mountain biking on our 30+ mile trail system.
Owned by Cedar Point
